name: where-2-compare
description: Tools & data to help compare locations across the US.

scripts.deploy_major: npm version major; git push --tags origin master; git push; pnpm deploy
scripts.deploy_minor: npm version minor; git push --tags origin master; git push; pnpm deploy
scripts.deploy_patch: npm version patch; git push --tags origin master; git push; pnpm deploy

author: me@stevensoule.com
